text: @GregAbbott_TX So, @GregAbbott_TX how many more hapless seniors and innocent POC are you gonna kill off before you reach your goal of souls collected for The AntiChrist? RepubliCONS are all f🤬 ghouls & monsters. #Texas #COVIDIOTS #COVID19 https://t.co/Y3uO4p1LRb
